links.*: Cirion and Eorl and the Friendship of Gondor and Rohan

wikitext.*:
'''Voronda''' is a [[Quenya]] adjective meaning 'faithful' or 'steadfast', given as a title or surname to the great hero [[Elendil]].<ref>{{UT|Cirion}}, notes 43-44</ref>
